original_query: SELECT MIN(p.Id) FROM posts as p, postLinks as pl, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.OwnerUserId = u.Id AND p.CommentCount<=17 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 07:12:16' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CommentCount <= 17
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.Id=E2.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 07:12:16'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
